resources.string: 6.1 Please read the Passport Instruction Booklet carefully before filling the form. Furnishing of incorrect information/ suppression of information would lead to rejection of the application and would attract penal provisions as prescribed under the Passports Act, 1967. Please produce your original documents at the time of submission of the form.
Have you ever been charged with criminal proceedings or any arrest warrant/summon pending before a court in India?

6.2 Have you at any time during the period of 5 years immediately preceding the date of this application been convicted by a court in India for any criminal offence and sentenced to imprisonment for two years or more?
6.3 Have you ever been refused or denied passport?
6.4 Has your Passport ever been Impounded or Revoked?
6.5 Have you ever applied for/ been granted political asylum to/ by any foreign country?
6.6 Have you ever returned to India on Emergency Certificate (EC) or were ever deported or repatriated?

I owe allegiance to the sovereignty, unity and integrity of India, and have not voluntarily acquired citizenship or travel document of any other country. I have not lost, surrendered or been deprived of the citizenship of India and I affirm that the information given by me in this form and the enclosures is true and I am solely responsible for its accuracy, and I am liable to be penalized or prosecuted if found otherwise. I am aware that under the Passports Act, 1967 it is a criminal offence to furnish any false information or to suppress any material information with a view to obtaining p assport or travel document.
